mapper.insert: INSERT INTO review (uidx, iidx, content, rating) VALUES (#{uidx},#{iidx},#{content},#{rating})
mapper.select: select r.ridx, r.uidx, r.iidx, r.content, r.rating, r.date, u.username from review as r join user as u on r.uidx = u.uidx where iidx = #{iidx} order by r.ridx desc
mapper.update: update review set content=#{content}, where ridx = #{ridx} and iidx = #{iidx}
mapper.delete: delete from review where uidx=#{uidx} and ridx = #{ridx}
